Template

Weapon Adjective Reference

These are specific to Type=weapon templates. 

EXPLODE
FLESHHIT
TRAILTHING
TRAILCYLRADIUS
TRAILRANDANGLE
ELEMENTSIZE
DAMAGE
MINDAMAGE
TYPEFLAGS
DAMAGECLASS
RANGE
RATE
FORCE

EXPLODE

Explosion template

Use: explode=templatename

FLESHHIT

Template to use when the flesh is hit

Use: fleshhit=templatename

TRAILTHING

Trailing visual effect template

Use: trailthing=templatename

TRAILCYLRADIUS

Trailing particles radius (imaginary trailing column)

Use: trailcylradius=flex Used with TRAILRANDANGLE to bounce the effect inside of an imaginary coloumn

TRAILRANDANGLE

Trailing particles random angle

Use: trailrandangle=flex Used with TRAILCYLRADIUS to bounce the effect inside of an imaginary coloumn

ELEMENTSIZE

Trailing particles distance

Use: elementsize=flex

DAMAGE

Amount of damage inflicted

Use: damage=flex

MINDAMAGE

Minium damage to inflict,because weapon damge decays with distance (RATE)

Use: mindamge=flex

TYPEFLAGS

Flag type Weapon Flags

Use: typflags=int

DAMAGECLASS

Class of damage Damage Flags

Use: damageclass=int (only one bit allowed)

RANGE

Weapon Range

Use: range=flex

RATE

Damage decay rate (distance)

Use: rate=flex

FORCE

Force

Use: force=flex
